import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../../img/puma-logo.svg'; import bg1 from '../../img/img-1.jpg'; import bg2 from '../../img/img-2.jpg'; import bg3 from '../../img/img-3.jpg'; import bg4 from '../../img/img-4.jpg'; import bg5 from '../../img/img-5.jpg'; import Menu from './../Menu/Menu'; import './App.sass'; const menu = [ { text: 'Studio' }, { text: 'Partners' }, { text: 'Media' }, { text: 'user' } ] const App = () => { const [radiusLength, setRadiusLength] = useState(1004); const [background, setBackground] = useState(bg1); let firstStep = () => { setRadiusLength(1004); setBackground(bg1); } let secondStep = () => { setRadiusLength(753); setBackground(bg2); } let thirdStep = () => { setRadiusLength(502); setBackground(bg3); } let fourthStep = () => { setRadiusLength(251); setBackground(bg4); } let fivesthStep = () => { setRadiusLength(0); setBackground(bg5); } return (
firstStep()}> secondStep()}> thirdStep()}> fourthStep()}> fivesthStep()}>
) } export default App;
